data.title: Ertjies Bezuidenhout Age, Birthday, Zodiac Sign and Birth Chart
data.meta_description: Astrology details of Ertjies Bezuidenhout such as age, birthday, zodiac sign, and natal chart. Analyze their birth chart and kundli to understand their personality and cause of death through astrology.
data.text:
Ernst Bezuidenhout, commonly known as Ertjies, was a notable South African cyclist born on October 13, 1955, in Vanderbijlpark. He gained recognition in the cycling community for his notable participation in various cycling events. Ertjies made a significant impact during his career until his passing on February 29, 2012, in Pretoria. His contributions to the sport and his legacy continue to be remembered by cycling enthusiasts.
